entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
